net.sf.microlog.format
Class SimpleFormatter

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.microlog.format.SimpleFormatter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Formatter
public final class SimpleFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Formatter

A simple formatter that only outputs the level, the message and the Throwable object.

Author:
Johan Karlsson (johan.karlsson@jayway.se)

          Create a SimpleFormatter.

Method Detail

getDelimeter

public char getDelimeter()
Get the delimeter that is used between the different fields when logging.

Returns:
the delimeter

setDelimeter

public void setDelimeter(char delimeter)

Parameters:

format

public java.lang.String format(Level level,
                               java.lang.Object message,
                               java.lang.Throwable t)
Format the given message and the Throwable object. The format is {Level}{-message.toString()}{-t}

Specified by:
format in interface Formatter
Parameters:
level - the logging level. If null, it is not appended to the String.
message - the message. If null, it is not appended to the String.
t - the exception. If null, it is not appended to the String.
Returns:
a String that is not null.

setProperty

public void setProperty(java.lang.String property,
                        java.lang.Object value)
Set the named property with the specified value. This is part og the Formatter interface, but is ignored by the SimpleFormatter.s

Specified by:
setProperty in interface Formatter
Parameters:
property - the property to set.
value - the value to set.
